name: Seven Slash - The Return of the Living Chickens
name_original: Seven Slash - The Return of the Living Chickens
description:
In The Return of the Dead Chickens you take control over a mad scientist who wants to feed his little *cute* space cats. To achieve this, he tries to clone a grilled chicken but things gone terribly wrong....

Your task is to build your way upwards, out of your laboratory to the space cats using your epic weapon, called BlockCreator-2000.
